did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Eden Centre Washingtonian Temperance Society records, 1844-1847.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Eden Centre Washingtonian Temperance Society (Eden Centre, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Constitution, meeting minutes, a temperance pledge signed by the members, and a pre-printed circular of the New York State Temperance Society.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Constitution, meeting minutes, a temperance pledge signed by the members, and a pre-printed circular of the New York State Temperance Society.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: Not to be published or otherwise released in such form that any individual mentioned in the records can be identified.
